reviews.sentence: 1st time to Miami. Hotel was very nice and in a very quiet location on the canal. Water view was quite nice along with the pool and the restaurant attached to the hotel. Can only say when we comeback to Miami we will use this hotel and recommend this to friends. Very Clean Bathroom a little to small but made the best of it. Balcony was very nice very convenient to south beach 14 miles away. no problems going and coming back to the hotel Husband says you have cable. Need ESPN.

Not so good. We were very disappointed in the hotel which was really a motel. The pool area was nice as was the view. The room however had a bad smell and had fruit flies. When we complained about the fruit flies a worker was sent to our room with a can of bug spray. Unhappy with that resolve we asked for a different room. When we got to the new room the room smelled as if it had just been sprayed with bug spray. We asked to be given a refund so that we could find a different hotel. Management was kind enough to give us the refund which was credited to Expedia. The rooms furnishings left much to be desired. With the exception of the pool there was nothing we liked about the hotel. In a very high traffic area. This hotel should be called a motel.

Excellent hotel stay during July 4th weekend. My husband and I really enjoyed our July 4th weekend at this hotel. We were able to get the rest and relaxation we needed. The room was a very good size included a refrigerator freezer and microwave. The bed was comfortable and I was able to get a good night sleep each day. I really enjoyed the view from the hotel pool dock and patio. The staff were super friendly courteous and helpful. I will definitely stay there again. Its a great location to see fireworks on July 4th.
Family holiday. Great location for South beach friendly helpful staff good breakfast lovely pool.

pool full breakfast L bus to south beach Amtrak. Great time quiet nice music from Shuckers restaurant for pool play. can not hear it elsewhere so not disturbing. Right on L bus line. east to South Beach West to Amtrak. Shuttle to from MIA. You do have to call FROM airport though. they do not loop through as bigger hotels do. Great views pelicans dolphins boats pool breakfast was there for conference. lots of stuff seen from bus ride but nothing visited. malls restaurants. room fresheners.

It was average. We checked in early because we went post cruise luckily a room was ready and the front desk agents we are friendly and very helpful. The pool was warm and very clean. It took us awhile to find a vending machine with food and the drink machine was sold out of water and the orange water in the lobby was not coming out. The room was average for the price not great not horrible. Wifi was iffy at times but overall the stay was ok.

Very nice hotel not the cheapest though. Well it was one of the cheapest in Miami Beach area but the same quality can be had for three times less in other areas. Guess it is just the economy. But we really liked the pool the view from the pool clean rooms and overall appearance. Also the staff were really nice especially Vivian who hosted the breakfast.

Great Location. we stayed at this location for the weekend this is a good location close to the beach good service The staff were extremely friendly the rate was good and the room was nice and comfortable. few miles to downtown Miami. 15 mins away from the airport. water view and the amazing pool. they let us use it late in the night I. will be back for sure.

Comfortable and clean the hotel staff is always approachable and welcoming. would be great if they added some more tv channels. ESPN Velocity DYI and HGTV. But your on the water and the pool is fantastic.

Convenient Hotel in Mid Miami. The Best Western on the Bay was a good spot for my friends and I to celebrate a long Memorial Day weekend. It was located centrally to most spots we wanted to visit and seemed like a lot of others took advantage of it is location also right on the bay which provided for great views. I was disappointed to find out that it was wrongly advertised on the third party website that they provided rolaway beds. we were told this upon check in rudely I might add that they have never offered rolaway beds in the history of the hotel. Regardless we did not let this ruin our trip and simply squeezed ourselves in the room. The bathroom was spacious which was helpful in the double room. We also enjoyed the restaurant downstairs and being able to relax at the pool. For the price it was very reasonable and pretty much exactly what you would expect for what you paid. Staff was friendly and helpful when needed. Be aware that there is a 100 parking fee per night per car when you arrive. Overall it was a good stay and I would book again if needing a last minute hotel away from all the hustle and bustle of Miami.

Only because. Gazing across the bay I see boats birds and beautiful water. This location is really nice. The hotel is under renovation so it is not running at 100. The pool is closed and the bay front rooms are under construction. This place has a solid local bar right on the water which is why I chose to stay here. The room is comfortable but needs attention. The bathroom smells of mildew. The bed and sheets are comfortable and clean. Once the renovation is complete this would be a great place to stay. if they do it right.

Very good stay. A big thank you to Vivian who was very helpful and kind every morning whilst helping during the breakfast timethe hotel was clean and tidy. We only stayed for 3 days. Very good priceStaf at the the desk always willing to help. Clean but small swimming pool. Quiet location. Very nice restaurant on site.

Disappointing. The location is good but the hotel just gave us the creeps and we switched after one night. The shower did not work when we tried to shower the room smelled very musty spotted two roaches as soon as we walked in. It seemed like the room was dated furniture worn. The beds however were very nice. The pool looked great too and the view was great. I understand sitting on the water dampness is a constant battle still we were glad to leave. The hotel lobby was under construction when we got there. view beds pool update furniture work a little harder on the roaches better dehumidifiers air conditioning.

TOO MANY BUGS. I recently was scheduled to stay for one week at the Best Western currently under construction in one of their two buildings. I arrived later in the day on my first day so basically checked in and went to bed. When I woke up on the second day I walked into the bathroom turned on the light and the movement on the counter was just incredible. Cockroaches racing around. I immediately called the front desk and was told someone would be up after 7 am this was about 630 am and also the manager would be in at 7 am. I walked over to the dresser and opened a drawer and again roaches. they were crawling in my clothes. So I packed up and went downstairs talking to the very nice man at the front desk. He was totally understanding offered me another room which I declined and I checked out. It was a real disappointment as I was looking forward to being on the beach and at the pool which had been remodeled.

Cheap and fair. Hotel is in reform thus some uncomfortable. A C in the room did not work properly temperature was set on 60 F when we arrived and felt like 78 F Mattress with hole in the middle and pillows too higth. No enough towels for the pool thus I did not receive towel. Beautiful marina and Restaurant view.

Nive overnight stay before a cruise. The hotel is old and show its age a bit but the staff are wonderful. We needed a one night stop over before out cruise and this was a good price. We arrived early just before noon and our room was not ready. We had lunch at Shuckers and by 1 had our room. The room was small but it suited our immediate needs. The only disappointment for us was the very cold pool. My son is 7 and there was not much for him to do so we had hoped he could spend a few hours enjoying the pool. Unfortunately the pool was freezing. But the staff went out if their way to help us even talked me through setting up an Uber account for our ride to the cruise port the next morning. Really exceptional service. Staff Not walking distance to anything Cold pool. lack of anything else to do on site.

Pretty good overall would stay again. The pool was awesome and having shuckers right there was great. Plus the patio deck on the second floor was open so we could hang out with our friends who were staying in a different room. Staff was great and the room was clean. Air conditioner worked awesome and the view was beautiful over the bay. Housekeeping brought us new towels daily and you can by the pool at night even though you ca n’t swim. The pool closes at 9. The breakfast buffet is 16 a person. 10 a night parking and it ’s ridiculous to find parking close to the hotel. Water pressure was super low. There ’s also not a sandy area by the water but the drive to the beaches was n’t that bad. I ’m a genius member and I requested a late check out which I was email confirmation and the hotel only gave us an hour instead of the two hours we had confirmed.

Clean well run hotel with good facilities. Well placed on causeway for access by car to city or sea. For an inexpensive hotel breakfast was excellent with a chef in attendance to cook to your request. Breakfast area was separate from main restaurant which was open to non residents and very popular. This could mean waiting for a table in the evenings. Both had a view over the bay. The hotel had been recently re furbished and was spotlessly clean well serviced by friendly and attentive staff. The main restaurant served a good choice of food and drink. The pool area was small but reasonably secluded and well equipped with chairs sunbeds and shades. Not being on the beach the hotel is more suited to use if touring. A car is an asset and ample parking is available at 10 nightly. Placed on the causeway meant that access to the beaches or the city was easy. A bus service passes on the main road with a stop nearby. There are some facilities close by The Black Sheep was good for breakfast and a change of bar in the evening. Hapys Stork Bar is an old institution and worth a visit. Building and door are off putting but it is old fashioned and friendly inside. Overall good value for money. I would be pleased to stay there again. Restaurant was very good and very popular which meant a wait for a table especially at weekends.

Would definately stay here again if we came back with our family. Friendly staff decent breakfast buffet not included an extra 12 16 per person close to town even possible to walk took us 30 min. Good restaurant and bar at the hotel but also some good restaurants near by. Nice view over the bay and ocean. A bit noisy. The restaurant got very crowded in the evenings we had problems finding a table if you just wanted to sit Down for a drink. Could get a little crowded around the pool. No beaches in immediate walking distance but a short drive to Miami Beach.
Nice. Friends Staff wonderfulClean hotel. The reception. when I was there there is Some difficult to reach the loopy And summing pool was not cleanness.

Great location. Enjoyed Shuckers and sitting at the bay. Older hotel. Clean. Comfortable bed and pillows. TINY bathroom. Bad deodorizer odor in the lobby. The outlets in the lamp base on my nightstand were loose so my c pap machine kept turning off during my sleep because of the loose outlet connection. I did not have a restful sleep. I woke up several times throughout the night due to the loose outlet. No reachable outlet behind the nightstand. VERY DUSTY when I moved the nightstand to look. I explained this to the front desk and other than acknowledging that they would check the lamp they offered no apology or other compensation for my lack of sleep. No intelligent front desk interest pother than handing me a receipt. VERY OBNOXIOUSLY NOISY MUSIC OUTSIDE. We had to keep our balcony door closed because of the guest loud boom box music at the hotel pool to the South. We did not get to enjoy the balcony.

Disappointing. Reception people were ok. Small and shaby room with a noisy aircon blowing a meter from your bed. Strange people drinking own beer inside the swimming pool. No aircon in a slow lift. Really poor value for money.
